participant_2.name: Liam Carter
participant_2.personality: Dedicated, passionate, and a bit introverted, Liam throws himself into his art and values deep connections.
participant_2.background: My favorite food is hamburgers. My parents passed away in a car accident. I work many hours rehearsing for my show. I like movies based on comedies. I am a ballet dancer.
